title: The Best American Short Stories

preceded-by.note: The Best Short Stories of [the Year], and the Yearbook of the American Short Story

additional-notes: Renewals for this annual were initially filed under Books, not Periodicals.

This serial includes reprints of stories originally published in other venues. While we know of no contribution renewals prior to 1964 that specifically mention this collection, we have not checked for renewals that cover the stories as originally published.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Scott F Andrews for copyright research on this title.
